attributes.additional_details:
I didn't realise what the school fines were when you take your child out of the school.  In Ayesbury there was a family of 2 children been fined for £240. Why are schools fining children and parents? Surely £60 per family or £60 per child would be suffice, not £60 per child and parent.

Families have low income cannot afford school holiday prices. Please drop these high fines and look at the family welfare.
